array:
\begin{array}{ccc}
\quad [\Pi_a] = [(n_a, m_a)] & \raw & z_a = R \cdot (n_a + \tau m_a) 
\cdot x_a  \\
\quad [\Pi_b] = [(n_b, m_b)] & \raw & z_b = R \cdot (n_b + \tau m_b) 
\cdot x_b \\
\quad [\Pi_c] = [(n_c, m_c)] & \raw & z_c = R \cdot (n_c + \tau m_c) 
\cdot x_c
\

\begin{array}{c}
x_a = \left(I_{bc}/d\right) \cdot x \\ 
x_b = \left(I_{ca}/d\right) \cdot x \\ 
x_c = \left(I_{ab}/d\right) \cdot x
\

\begin{array}{c}
x = \left(x_0 + l\right) \\
x_0 \in \real, \ l \in \inte \\
d = g.c.d. \left( I_{ab}, I_{bc}, I_{ca} \right) 
\

\begin{array}{ccc}
\quad [\Pi_a] = \bigotimes_{r = 1}^n [(n_a^{(r)}, m_a^{(r)})] 
& \quad \raw \quad & 
z_a =  \left( z_a^{(1)}, z_a^{(2)}, \dots, z_a^{(n)} \right), \\
\quad [\Pi_b] =  \bigotimes_{r = 1}^n [(n_b^{(r)}, m_b^{(r)})] 
& \quad \raw  \quad & 
z_b = \left( z_b^{(1)}, z_b^{(2)}, \dots, z_b^{(n)} \right), \\
\quad [\Pi_c] = \bigotimes_{r = 1}^n [(n_c^{(r)}, m_c^{(r)})] 
& \quad \raw \quad & 
z_c = \left( z_c^{(1)}, z_c^{(2)}, \dots, z_c^{(n)} \right).
\

\begin{array}{c}
z_a^{(r)} = R^{(r)} \cdot \left(n_a^{(r)} + \tau^{(r)} m_a^{(r)}\right) 
I_{bc}^{(r)} x^{(r)} / d^{(r)} \\ 
z_b^{(r)} = R^{(r)} \cdot \left(n_b^{(r)} + \tau^{(r)} m_b^{(r)}\right)  
I_{ca}^{(r)} x^{(r)} / d^{(r)} \\ 
z_c^{(r)} = R^{(r)} \cdot \left(n_c^{(r)} + \tau^{(r)} m_c^{(r)}\right)  
I_{ab}^{(r)} x^{(r)} / d^{(r)}
\

\begin{array}{c}
x^{(r)} = \left(x_0^{(r)} + l^{(r)} \right) \\
x_0^{(r)} \in \real, \ l^{(r)} \in \inte \\
d^{(r)} = g.c.d. \left( I_{ab}^{(r)}, I_{bc}^{(r)}, I_{ca}^{(r)} \right) 
\
